Module kivakit.serialization.gson
Package com.telenav.kivakit.serialization.gson.factory

Class BaseGsonFactory

java.lang.Object
com.telenav.kivakit.core.messaging.broadcasters.Multicaster
com.telenav.kivakit.core.messaging.repeaters.BaseRepeater
com.telenav.kivakit.serialization.gson.factory.BaseGsonFactory
All Implemented Interfaces:
Broadcaster, Listener, Repeater, Transceiver, Receiver, Transmitter, NamedObject, GsonFactory
Direct Known Subclasses:
CoreGsonFactory
public abstract class BaseGsonFactory extends BaseRepeater implements GsonFactory
Factory that produces configured Gson JSON serializers via gson().
Author:
jonathanl (shibo)

    • addInstanceCreator

      public <T> BaseGsonFactory addInstanceCreator​(Class<T> type, com.google.gson.InstanceCreator<T> creator)
      Adds a Gson InstanceCreator to the builder that creates a Gson when GsonFactory.gson() is called. The InstanceCreator is used to create new instances of a type during deserialization.
      Specified by:
      addInstanceCreator in interface GsonFactory

    • addJsonDeserializer

      public <T> BaseGsonFactory addJsonDeserializer​(Class<T> type, com.google.gson.JsonDeserializer<T> deserializer)
      Adds a JsonDeserializer to the builder that creates a Gson when GsonFactory.gson() is called. The JsonDeserializer is used to deserialize fields.
      Specified by:
      addJsonDeserializer in interface GsonFactory

    • addJsonSerializer

      public <T> BaseGsonFactory addJsonSerializer​(Class<T> type, com.google.gson.JsonSerializer<T> serializer)
      Adds a JsonSerializer to the builder that creates a Gson when GsonFactory.gson() is called. The JsonSerializer is used to serialize fields.
      Specified by:
      addJsonSerializer in interface GsonFactory

    • addJsonSerializerDeserializer

      public <T> BaseGsonFactory addJsonSerializerDeserializer​(Class<T> type, JsonSerializerDeserializer<T> deserializer)
      Adds a JsonSerializerDeserializer to the builder that creates a Gson when GsonFactory.gson() is called. The A JsonSerializerDeserializer is a typesafe KivaKit interface for objects that are both a serializer and a deserializer.
      Specified by:
      addJsonSerializerDeserializer in interface GsonFactory
